sen.j: 朝倉 経景（あさくら つねかげ、永享10年（1438年）- 延徳3年1月26日 (旧暦)（1491年3月6日））は室町時代の武将である。
sen.e: Tsunekage ASAKURA (born in 1438 and died in March 15, 1491) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Muromachi period.
Tsunekage ASAKURA (1438-March 15, 1491) was a busho (Japanese military commander) in the Muromachi period.

sen.j: 朝倉敏景（英林）の異母弟にあたる。
sen.e: He was a half younger brother with the same father of Toshikage ASAKURA.

sen.j: 与三右衛門尉、下野守と称する。
sen.e: He called himself Yozauemon no jo, Shimotsuke no kami (the governor of Shimotsuke Province).
He called himself Yozaemon no jo, Shimotsuke no kami (the governor of Shimotsuke Province).
sen.cmt: Yozauemon を Yozaemon に修正しました。

sen.j: 子は朝倉景職、足羽郡深岳寺の住持祖心紹越。
sen.e: His son was Kagemoto ASAKURA and Shoetsu SOSHIN, a chief priest of Shingaku-ji Temple in Asuwa-gun.
His son was Kagemoto ASAKURA and Shoetsu SOSHIN, a chief priest of Shingaku-ji Temple in Asuwa County.

sen.j: 長禄合戦や応仁の乱で兄を補佐して戦う。
sen.e: In the battle of Choroku and the Onin War, he assisted his brother in fighting.
In the Battle of Choroku and the Onin War, he assisted his brother in fighting.
sen.cmt: battle を Battle に修正しました。
sen.e: In the Battle of Choroku and the Onin War, he assisted his brother in fighting.

sen.j: 応仁2年（1468年）閏10月14日、京に甥の朝倉氏景 (8代当主)と配下の兵を残し、朝倉敏景、朝倉光玖、朝倉景冬の兄弟揃って越前国へ下る。
sen.e: On December 7, 1468, he left his nephew, Ujikage ASAKURA (the eighth head of the family) and vassals in Kyoto, he went to Echizen Province with his brothers, Toshikage ASAKURA, Kokyu ASAKURA and Kagefuyu ASAKURA.

sen.j: 文明 (日本)3年（1471年）、朝倉敏景が東軍に寝返った。
sen.e: In 1471, Toshikage ASAKURA betrayed and turned to the East Camp.

sen.e: After Toshikage died, he supported Ujikage ASAKURA (the eighth head of the family) and realized to unify Echizen Province.

sen.j: 軍略上の要衝地安居（福井市）を領し、安居城に拠った。
sen.e: He possessed a strategic point, Ago (Fukui Prefecture) and settled in Ago Castle.

sen.j: 長享3年（1489年）4月以降に入道し退耕斎と号した。
sen.e: After May, 1489, he became a Buddhist priest and called himself Taikosai.
